data.actual_result: You cannot see the message you are editing.
data.expected_result: App goes towards your edited message so you can see it when you edit it.
data.short_description: When editing a message towards the top of the screen, app does not center around message being edited.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go into a channel you have typed in. - Scroll so that you position a message you have sent right under the channel name. - Hold and edit the message.
